lines.text: Go to sleep.
What, with you in the room?
Well, I can't rub you from the hallway.
Any female trouble?
Nothing but, Sergeant.
I am an alien spouse of female military personnel en route to the United States under public law 271 of the Congress.
My name is Rochard. You'll think I'm a bride but actually I'm a husband. There'll be a moment or two of confusion but, if we all keep our heads, everything will be fine.
You're not Mrs. Rochard!
I'm MISTER Rochard.
Well, it's your WIFE who must report here for transportation to Bremerhaven.
According to the War Department, I AM my wife.
You can't be your wife!
If the American army says that I CAN be my wife, who am I to dispute them?

[Rochard is holding a baby for a stranger. His wife and Kitty walk up, both laughing]
Ah, Henri, you look so maternal!
What is that?
A human fire extinguisher. You wanna try it?
Oh, come on.
[takes baby andfrowns at its prodigious wetness]
Aww, he's cute. What's his name?
Niagara.

[shaking hand dry]
Henri, what a thing to do.
Where's the mother?
She went to get *more* water.
She ought to get a plumber!

[humiliated after Capt. Rochard publicly returns her laundry in an insinuating manner]
Oh, what a stinker YOU are.

[cooly]
Did I forget something?
What a dirty stinker - and you're going right back in that office and explain to them how you got my laundry by mistake in Dusseldorf and forgot to give it back to me.
Well, it's such a dull story. Who would care?
You know what you made them think?

[feigning innocence]
I don't quite understa... Oh, no! You mean you and ME? Well, I'd be glad to explain to them. The very idea of any connection is revolting.
No, you don't. No, you don't. Never mind. Just forget it.
But I'd be delighted. I'll explain to them I think you're repulsive.
Well, on the contrary, the process of turning a man into a woman is enormously complicated, but I'll do my best.
You from Brooklyn?
Yonkers.
What are those?
I wonder what the army'd do if I deserted?
They'd shoot you. The thought makes my mouth water.
Henry, we're dead.
Well, this is a fine wedding night.
He could leave marks on me anytime. I'd bring the stick!
